short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark Mode for https://www.edgegamers.com/ using discord colours.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is used for https://www.edgegamers.com/, specifically using discord's dark colours in replace of the white-bright colour that there currently is, this will work with all new pages they decide to make. This is SPECIFICALLY for edgegamers, targets certain CSS classes only used by them.

Everything was turned dark, even the account settings page & more
